Home / Videos / Interview with Dean Wampler @ GOTO Chicago 2015

Interview with Dean Wampler @ GOTO Chicago 2015

Description: Dean Wampler is a technology surfer, always riding the lip of the curve. Dean is a frequent speaker on AOP, Functional Programming with Scala, and Big Data as well as a user-group founder and author. Most recently he’s started the Chicago-Area Scala Enthusiasts (CASE) group. If you’re interested in Scala you need to checkout “Programming Scala” by Dean Wampler & Alex Payne.
Published: Apr 20, 2022
